methodOfCooking: Fry onions, garlic, and turmeric in mustard oil. Add potatoes and cook until tender. Add bamboo shoots and beans, simmer until flavors meld together.
Mix rice flour, sugar, and cardamom with water and milk. Heat ghee in a pan and deep fry the dough in circular shapes until golden brown.
Make a batter from rice flour and water. Pour it onto a hot pan to make a thin base. Add toppings like meat, egg, and vegetables, and cook until crispy.
